Description:
Detects execution of "odbcconf" with "REGSVR" in order to register a new DLL (equivalent to running regsvr32). Attackers abuse this to install and run malicious DLLs.

Author: Kirill Kiryanov, Beyu Denis, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New DLL Registered Via Odbcconf.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%regsvr %' and command like '%.dll%') and (process_path like '%\odbcconf.exe' and original_file_name = 'odbcconf.exe'))
